author.organization: Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications

abstract.t: This document analyzes the Information distribution models in the Autonomic Networks that are based on the ANI. Most of instantaneous modes and their requirements have been met by GRASP already. However, in order to effectively support the asynchronous information distribution modes, which is newly described in this document, several new GRASP extensions are defined. This document also describes the corresponding behaviors on processing these new extensions.
